column5: The Blue House.Port Aransas Beach Close, 3 bedroom, 2 bath,unit sleeps 10. King in the master. 2 Queens 2 twins and a Queen sleeper sofa. Less than a min drive or 4 min walk to the beach. Pet friendly & no size or weight limit.Gated sun deck. Pool onsite. In town.Large lot with 3 units,bring the whole family rent all 3 units.Lots of Parking, boats too.
column8: Blue House*Beach Close* Pool * Pets R Welcome!
